sentences.sentence: Control defects showed no osteoclastic activity with little to no bony healing.
sentences.translation: 对照缺损组未出现任何的破骨活性，也没有骨修复现象。

sentences.sentence: Objective To study the effects of domestic incadronate(ICD) on osteoclastic bone resorbing lacunae.
sentences.translation: 目的研究国产因卡磷酸钠（ICD）对破骨细胞性骨吸收的作用。

sentences.sentence: We compared th effect of interleukin-1 (IL1) alone or with osteoblasts on osteoclastic bone re-sorption.
sentences.translation: 建立了成骨细胞和破骨细胞共同培养体系，探讨了白细胞介素-1（IL1）促进骨吸收的作用机理。
